artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Publisher: Iseya Sanjirō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Tago no ura ni/ uchiidete mireba/ shirotae no/ Fuji no takane ni/ yuki wa furitsutsu 「山辺赤人　田子の浦に　うち出でてみれば　白妙の　富士の高根に　雪は降つつ」
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Poems Explained by the Nurse (Hyakunin isshu uba ga etoki 百人一首うはか縁説)
signed: Saki no Hokusai Manji 前北斎卍
text: Source image: Yamabe Akihito in "Hyakunin isshu zue" from 1807 『百人一首図絵』山辺赤人.
title: Poem by Yamabe no Akahito
